_header: Ne be thy wimple never so yellow ne so strutting
_description: On the vanity of fashions — two couplets

BLCottCleoCVI.Transcription: Ne be þi wimpil neuer so Iolu ne so stroutendeNe þi faire tail so long ne so trailendeÞat tu ne schalt schalt at euin kuttid bileuinAnd tou schalt to bedde gon so nakid as tou were
BLCottCleoCVI.Note: Olim f. 22. Added in lower margin beside 2994, written as prose.

Wright,  Thomas,
                        ed.  
             Songs and Carols.
Warton Club
         4. London: Richards, 1856: 552.

CamTCC43.Transcription:
Me leue leuedi ne be þi wimpil neuere so ȝelu ne so
                    stroutindene þi faire tail so long ne so trailendeþat tu ne
                    schalt ateuin al cuttid bileuin& tu schalt to bedde gon so nakid so
                    þu were
